name: FPS Prototype (GageGotGames)
description:
This was the first game that I created in Unreal Engine so that I could learn blueprints.

Features:

  • Basic Player Movement: Running, jumping)
  • Shooting
  • NPC's that ragdoll when shot
  • Spikes that damage the player when touched
  • Coin Pickups(Blue Objects)
  • Check Points (Green Objects)
